instructions: put the dinner cloth on the table cloth.
put the salad plate on the dinner plate.
keep the napkin on the salad plate.
place the wine glass right corner of the table cloth.
place water glass near by the wine glass on right corner.
place the salad fork on the left side of the table cloth.
place the dinner frok right side of the salad fork.
place the kinfe on the right side of the dinner plate.
place the soup spoon on the right side of the knife.the bowl of the spoon looking at upper position.
